title: The Quiet Way
description: he Quiet Way, a thriller You don't think there'll ever be a terror attack to match the Twin Towers?You don't think it could happen in central London anyway, even if it was possible?You are not suffering from any cold, or flu symptoms are you? Runny nose? Chesty cough? No?Well everything's just fine then, isn't it? The discovery of a terrorist plan to detonate 30 tons of ether in Britain. No one knows where or when. A beak-in at a research facility in North West England complicates the scene. DCI Hanks in a race against the odds to prevent the unthinkable. The conflicts of modern Britain under the spotlight, racism, political correctness and the laughable pampering to idiocy. All Hinder the investigator's progress leading to a final conflict of conscience questioning Justice and revenge or are they the same thing? A taut analysis of current virology and the defence of nations, which will leave you wondering where the next flu epidemic really came from.
author: Robin Melhuish
